channel.title: Enso II - [2011 RS BASED] [RELEASED!]
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/oqfvrr.png[/img] [b]Enso II - Next Generation RSPS[/b]
[b]Official Enso[/b] [b]Play now: [/b]http://enso-rs.com/game/connector/loader/play.html [b]Client Downloads: [/b]http://enso-rs.com/download.html [b]Hiscores: [/b]http://www.enso-rs.com/highscores/ [b]Community Forums: [/b]http://enso-rs.com/forum/
[b]Official Trailer[/b] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OpIhppnOAs8
[img]http://puu.sh/5by9Y.jpg[/img]
[b]Why would I pick Enso over other servers?[/b] -Enso has unique content, Enso is filled out with it. We will be giving you even though full 2011 RuneScape experience, Enso's way! Imagine a server with maps that are used much as possible. You can transform to monkey and go to the dangerous monkey madness cave for chinning? Imagine doing quests which unlocks items to your character. Enso has huge amount of amazing breath-taking content with a very minimal amount of glitches, and as a regular player the bugs are extremely hard to detect. Enso has very active and skilled development team which has.
[img]http://puu.sh/4gyY5.jpg[/img]
[b]What's the community like?[/b] -Competely amazing, staff will be always ready to listen your problems! Don't forget to visit at our amazing forums where you will be receiving help from other players; if you need it. Community is friendly and always been very nice.
[b]How I make money?[/b] -How did you make it back in the day? You were a staker? lurer? you like to kill bosses? What can we say? Welcome to Enso!
[img]http://puu.sh/44z5V.jpg[/img]
[b]Player VS Player[/b] -Competely insane, the combat feels like you're actually in RuneScape. The formulas are very accurate in combat system, for an example if you hybrid and you cast a barrage on your opponent which is in karils catching a barrage might be a problem!
[img]http://i41.tinypic.com/2mq86kn.png[/img]
[b]Why Enso?[/b] You like doing quests? Adventure around the world of Gielinor? Like killing some revenant killers? Hybridding? Playing some clanwars with friends? Hanging out in the Grand Exchange? Enso is made for you. [img]http://i43.tinypic.com/2ic1649.png[/img] Game Media [img]http://puu.sh/4hsQm.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/5ml15.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/5l2Id.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/5ml6D.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/5l2nW.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/5cY3Q.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/5c71M.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/5c72B.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/5c6Zy.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/5c6WT.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/5byeP.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/5bxbP.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/5bxEJ.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/5bxVl.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/5byi7.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/4ADdQ.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/4Bgny.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/4vgj8.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/4qQrc.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/4qQnn.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/4qiIp.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/4jMJ3.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/4jzpc.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/4jMEX.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/4jMtH.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/4eyPh.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/44zdO.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/4101K.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/40Z8Q.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/40Zka.jpg[/img] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/1zgq0ew.png[/img]
[b]Official Enso[/b] [b]Play now: [/b]http://enso-rs.com/game/connector/loader/play.html [b]Client Downloads: [/b]http://enso-rs.com/download.html [b]Hiscores: [/b]http://www.enso-rs.com/highscores/ [b]Community Forums: [/b]http://enso-rs.com/forum/[/center]

item.title: Enso II - [2011 RS BASED] [RELEASED!]
item.dc:creator: @Enso Enso
item.description:
@Enso wrote:

marcbob:

Great server with amazing content. The owner is constantly adding new features go check it out!

Thanks!

Heres some recent updates for Enso II.

I have recently added magic on player handler (system), this gives us ability to add things like energy transfer and vengeance other.
After some minutes I have finished the energy transfer.


I have completed literally 100% weapon poisoning to all possible weapons that can be poisoned.

Heal other lunar spell added.

Slayer skill is finished for public release. Will receive more content and features though.


Players have now ability to create a Dragonfire shield, has same requirements as in actual Runescape.

I have finished full Dragonfire shield.

Dragonfire’s charging system complete.

‘Wanted!’ quest has been fixed.

Feel free to try us out!

Read full topic

item.title: Enso II - [2011 RS BASED] [RELEASED!]
item.dc:creator: @Enso Enso
item.description:
@Enso wrote:

[center]
Enso II - Next Generation RSPS

Official Enso
Play now: http://enso-rs.com/game/connector/loader/play.html
Client Downloads: http://enso-rs.com/download.html
Hiscores: http://www.enso-rs.com/highscores/
Community Forums: http://enso-rs.com/forum/

Official Trailer
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OpIhppnOAs8

Why would I pick Enso over other servers?
-Enso has unique content, Enso is filled out with it. We will be giving you even though full 2011 RuneScape experience, Enso’s way! Imagine a server with maps that are used much as possible. You can transform to monkey and go to the dangerous monkey madness cave for chinning? Imagine doing quests which unlocks items to your character. Enso has huge amount of amazing breath-taking content with a very minimal amount of glitches, and as a regular player the bugs are extremely hard to detect. Enso has very active and skilled development team which has.

What’s the community like?
-Competely amazing, staff will be always ready to listen your problems! Don’t forget to visit at our amazing forums where you will be receiving help from other players; if you need it. Community is friendly and always been very nice.

How I make money?
-How did you make it back in the day? You were a staker? lurer? you like to kill bosses? What can we say? Welcome to Enso!

Player VS Player
-Competely insane, the combat feels like you’re actually in RuneScape. The formulas are very accurate in combat system, for an example if you hybrid and you cast a barrage on your opponent which is in karils catching a barrage might be a problem!

Why Enso?
You like doing quests? Adventure around the world of Gielinor? Like killing some revenant killers? Hybridding? Playing some clanwars with friends? Hanging out in the Grand Exchange? Enso is made for you.
